<entry>
		<title>Prism Launcher Release 9.1, now available</title>
		<link href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-9.1/"/>
		<updated>2024-10-24T00:00:00Z</updated>
		<id>https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-9.1/</id>
		<content type="html"><p>Hello!</p>
<p>This is a very minor update - we had reports of unexpected reboots when installing the launcher on Windows; this release should patch it!</p>
<p>Apologies for the delay - we were not initially quite aware of the impact that this had as Windows <em>should</em> warn users if they have any unsaved work.</p>
<h1 id="changelog" tabindex="-1">Changelog <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-9.1/#changelog" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h1>
<h2 id="fixed" tabindex="-1">Fixed <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-9.1/#fixed" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<ul>
<li>Fix Windows installer restarting device by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2948">#2948</a></li>
</ul>
<p>Full Changelog: <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/compare/9.0...9.1">https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/compare/9.0...9.1</a></p>
<p>You can <a href="https://prismlauncher.org/download/">grab the latest download here</a> for your respective platform.</p>
</content>
	</entry>
	
	<entry>
		<title>Prism Launcher Release 9.0, now available</title>
		<link href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-9.0/"/>
		<updated>2024-10-20T00:00:00Z</updated>
		<id>https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-9.0/</id>
		<content type="html"><p>Hello everyone!</p>
<p>It's been a while since the last update. Today is our second birthday and we are happy to celebrate it with you by releasing Prism Launcher 9.0, packed with features we've been working hard on! We hope you'll love playing around with these much-anticipated additions:</p>
<ul>
<li>Automatic Java Management – No more manual Java setups! Everything is streamlined and handled for you.</li>
<li>Automatic Component Version Resolution – Managing component versions just got easier, with automatic updates for things like Fabric mappings.</li>
<li>Skin Management – A simple and intuitive way to manage your Minecraft skins right in the launcher.</li>
<li>Updated Login System – Introduced direct login and QR code for a smoother experience.</li>
<li>More Filters in the Download Mods/Modpacks Dialog – Find your favorite mods/modpack faster with new filtering options.</li>
</ul>
<p>There's plenty more to explore, so feel free to dive in and check the changelog for the full list of updates!</p>
<p>As always, your feedback is invaluable. Let us know how it goes, and if you'd like to contribute to the project, head over to our GitHub and see how you can get involved.</p>
<p>Until next time!</p>
<h2 id="changelog" tabindex="-1">Changelog <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-9.0/#changelog" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<h2 id="added" tabindex="-1">Added <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-9.0/#added" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<ul>
<li>Add &quot;use zink&quot; button by <a href="https://github.com/DioEgizio">@DioEgizio</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2137">#2137</a></li>
<li>Add Java downloader by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a>, <a href="https://github.com/timoreo22">@timoreo22</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2069">#2069</a>, <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2813">#2813</a>, <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2811">#2811</a>, <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2808">#2808</a>, <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2795">#2795</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2755">#2755</a></li>
<li>Add SkipModpackUpdatePrompt setting by <a href="https://github.com/Kationor">@Kationor</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2607">#2607</a></li>
<li>Add UserData as another posible path for portable builds by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1529">#1529</a></li>
<li>Add a cat opacity option by <a href="https://github.com/lumiscosity">@lumiscosity</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1972">#1972</a></li>
<li>Add button to refresh themes and catpacks by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> and <a href="https://github.com/theMackabu">@theMackabu</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1823">#1823</a></li>
<li>Add checksum validator to resource download by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2757">#2757</a></li>
<li>Add config for transfer timeout by <a href="https://github.com/Edgars-Cirulis">@Edgars-Cirulis</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2415">#2415</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2662">#2662</a></li>
<li>Add filters for modpack search by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2887">#2887</a></li>
<li>Add functionality for components in resource pack descriptions. by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> and <a href="https://github.com/cullvox">@cullvox</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1617">#1617</a></li>
<li>Add mod reinstall dialog by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1892">#1892</a></li>
<li>Add more filters to the mod download dialog by <a href="https://github.com/Cartrigger">@Cartrigger</a>, <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a>, <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> and <a href="https://github.com/TayouVR">@TayouVR</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1728">#1728</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2533">#2533</a></li>
<li>Add random and slideshow modes to Catpacks by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1822">#1822</a></li>
<li>Add retry for auth steps on fail by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2416">#2416</a></li>
<li>Add setting for quickplay singleplayer by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2716">#2716</a></li>
<li>Add size column for resources by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1776">#1776</a></li>
<li>Add support for custom Technic client IDs by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2806">#2806</a></li>
<li>Add wait profiler by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1525">#1525</a></li>
<li>Add warnning when user closes the resource download dialog with selec… by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2566">#2566</a></li>
<li>Add webp to validIconExtensions by <a href="https://github.com/Kurumi78">@Kurumi78</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2771">#2771</a></li>
<li>Add ~/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/* to java installation detection by <a href="https://github.com/porterporter">@porterporter</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2570">#2570</a></li>
<li>Allow themes to modify log colours by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2740">#2740</a></li>
<li>Always load Java list on autodetect by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2735">#2735</a></li>
<li>Delete instances tmp diectory on startup by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2390">#2390</a></li>
<li>Display minecraft version if not mentioned for modrinth/curse packs by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2055">#2055</a></li>
<li>Fix JavaUtils to properly autodetect JVM paths on BSDs by <a href="https://github.com/Izder456">@Izder456</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2635">#2635</a></li>
<li>Generate updater metadata for mods added/updated using modpack updater/installer by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2583">#2583</a></li>
<li>Improve left and right cursor navigation in Instances by <a href="https://github.com/Edgars-Cirulis">@Edgars-Cirulis</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2758">#2758</a></li>
<li>Improvements to modlist export by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1847">#1847</a></li>
<li>Made updater interval configurable by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2054">#2054</a></li>
<li>Make dependency checking more lax by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1786">#1786</a></li>
<li>Skin management by <a href="https://github.com/LaoshuBaby">@LaoshuBaby</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1609">#1609</a>, <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2825">#2825</a>, <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2515">#2515</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2498">#2498</a></li>
<li>Sort screenshots chronologically in descending order by <a href="https://github.com/QazCetelic">@QazCetelic</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2798">#2798</a></li>
<li>[Windows] Search for Javas in Registry <code>HKEY_CURRENT_USER</code> by <a href="https://github.com/Kationor">@Kationor</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2714">#2714</a></li>
<li>Completly remove metadata on refresh by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2520">#2520</a></li>
<li>Control Prism data directory via env variable by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2590">#2590</a></li>
<li>Persist hidden state of &quot;ungrouped&quot; instance group by <a href="https://github.com/Ryex">@Ryex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2567">#2567</a></li>
<li>Sync modpack search field by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2874">#2874</a></li>
<li>Validate metadata on instance launch  by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2528">#2528</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 id="changed" tabindex="-1">Changed <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-9.0/#changed" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<ul>
<li>Add vc_redist as a NSIS install section by <a href="https://github.com/Ryex">@Ryex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2865">#2865</a></li>
<li>Always display Minecraft log tab by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2838">#2838</a></li>
<li>Display all system themes in widget theme selector by <a href="https://github.com/TayouVR">@TayouVR</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2596">#2596</a></li>
<li>Do not display message that no update is available if the check was … by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2580">#2580</a></li>
<li>Don't bundle JREs in Flatpak by <a href="https://github.com/getchoo">@getchoo</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2933">#2933</a></li>
<li>Improve Microsoft login by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2402">#2402</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2504">#2504</a></li>
<li>Improve wizard page by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2803">#2803</a>, <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2831">#2831</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2830">#2830</a></li>
<li>Prevent directories from being removed on instance update by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2906">#2906</a></li>
<li>Refactor hash task by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2536">#2536</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2609">#2609</a></li>
<li>Rename object name &quot;userInterfaceTab&quot; from &quot;generalTab&quot; by <a href="https://github.com/SolidStateDj">@SolidStateDj</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2311">#2311</a></li>
<li>Use <code>minecraft</code> instead of <code>.minecraft</code> for better accessibility by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2050">#2050</a></li>
<li>[Linux/macOS] Cleanup Nix documentation and flake by <a href="https://github.com/getchoo">@getchoo</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2738">#2738</a></li>
<li>Chore: update Qt to 6.7.1 by <a href="https://github.com/DioEgizio">@DioEgizio</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2481">#2481</a></li>
<li>Feat: Removed update disabled warning by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1526">#1526</a></li>
<li>Feat: refactored Instance ImportTask by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1409">#1409</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2694">#2694</a></li>
<li>Refactor MinecraftUpdate Task by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2633">#2633</a></li>
<li>Refresh account if it should refresh on instance launch by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2571">#2571</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 id="fixed" tabindex="-1">Fixed <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-9.0/#fixed" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<ul>
<li>Improve Java checking speed by using startsWith for gentoo paths by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2748">#2748</a></li>
<li>Ask user to retry if netjob fails by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1365">#1365</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2440">#2440</a></li>
<li>Component version resolusion on Minecraft version change by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Ryex">@Ryex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2547">#2547</a></li>
<li>Ensure that core mods tab is visible on correct versions by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2018">#2018</a></li>
<li>Fix a few missing help pages by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2650">#2650</a></li>
<li>Fix a few typos by <a href="https://github.com/benthetechguy">@benthetechguy</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2660">#2660</a></li>
<li>Fix a typo by <a href="https://github.com/AtomHare">@AtomHare</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2217">#2217</a></li>
<li>Fix crash when no resource version is available by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2897">#2897</a></li>
<li>Fix dead link to Modrinth authentication docs by <a href="https://github.com/UnownPlain">@UnownPlain</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2653">#2653</a></li>
<li>Fix demo mode by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1829">#1829</a></li>
<li>Fix inconsistent Ok in instance import by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1837">#1837</a></li>
<li>Fix invalid Java path message by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2745">#2745</a></li>
<li>Fix missing curseforge logo by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2561">#2561</a></li>
<li>Fix modrinth pack update by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2304">#2304</a></li>
<li>Fix non-persistent user icon selection in NewInstanceDialog.cpp by <a href="https://github.com/ajerick">@ajerick</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2574">#2574</a></li>
<li>Fix playtime recording by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1886">#1886</a></li>
<li>Fix sdkman on macos by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2572">#2572</a></li>
<li>Fix search term not remaining the same between providers on resource … by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2863">#2863</a></li>
<li>Fix shader packs detection by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1827">#1827</a></li>
<li>Fix system theme detection by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2749">#2749</a></li>
<li>Fix(net/validators): ensure buffers are cleared and reset; by <a href="https://github.com/Ryex">@Ryex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2655">#2655</a></li>
<li>Fix: don't annoy when java tmpdir jvmarg is set &amp; /tmp is noexec by <a href="https://github.com/turret-dev">@turret-dev</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2867">#2867</a></li>
<li>Fix: ensure all connections to the ProgressDialogs's Task the dialog made are disconnected by <a href="https://github.com/Ryex">@Ryex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2916">#2916</a></li>
<li>Force clear the resource selection by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1977">#1977</a></li>
<li>Keep libGLU in Flatpak by <a href="https://github.com/arnfaldur">@arnfaldur</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2890">#2890</a></li>
<li>Prefer stronger hashes from Modrinth by <a href="https://github.com/Ryex">@Ryex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2751">#2751</a></li>
<li>Prevent infinite recursion when mod icon load fails by <a href="https://github.com/Ryex">@Ryex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2907">#2907</a></li>
<li>Remove all the slowdown code from CocurrentTask by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2789">#2789</a></li>
<li>Remove dependencies if review mods is rejected by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2173">#2173</a></li>
<li>Rename disabled file on mod duplication by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1752">#1752</a></li>

	<entry>
		<title>Prism Launcher Release 8.4, now available</title>
		<link href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.4/"/>
		<updated>2024-06-23T00:00:00Z</updated>
		<id>https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.4/</id>
		<content type="html"><p>Hello there!</p>
<p>The latest Prism Launcher update brings enhanced support for NeoForge and ATLauncher modpacks, along with significant improvements to user experience on macOS and critical bug fixes, including better CurseForge export and stability improvements. Enjoy the new features and smoother operations with this release!</p>
<p>Until next time!</p>
<h2 id="added" tabindex="-1">Added <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.4/#added" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<ul>
<li>Add NeoForge support for Technic packs and ATLauncher packs by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2382">#2382</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Add support for bcachefs for Copy-on-Write instance copies by <a href="https://github.com/KernelFreeze">@KernelFreeze</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2438">#2438</a></li>
<li>[macOS] Add sdkman to java search paths  by <a href="https://github.com/dqfan2012">@dqfan2012</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2377">#2377</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 id="changed" tabindex="-1">Changed <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.4/#changed" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<ul>
<li>Enhance the process of removing invalid characters from a path by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2425">#2425</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2531">#2531</a></li>
<li>Update the auth server domain to the correct one to use for pinging in logs by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2471">#2471</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Shorten desktop entry comment field by <a href="https://github.com/deadmeu">@deadmeu</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1032">#1032</a></li>
<li>[macOS] Improve blocked mods dialog by <a href="https://github.com/kthchew">@kthchew</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2379">#2379</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 id="fixed" tabindex="-1">Fixed <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.4/#fixed" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<ul>
<li>Ensure markdown images have a line break when following a list by <a href="https://github.com/SabrePenguin">@SabrePenguin</a> and <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2346">#2346</a></li>
<li>Fix CurseForge export caused by UTF-8 issues by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2353">#2353</a></li>
<li>Fix downloading packs with invalid characters by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2366">#2366</a></li>
<li>Fix image width in project description by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2341">#2341</a></li>
<li>Fix importing of vanilla technic modpacks by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2439">#2439</a></li>
<li>Fix incorrect launch time by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2423">#2423</a></li>
<li>Fix portable if manifest is missing by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2405">#2405</a></li>
<li>Fix resizing too small causing an index out of range crash by <a href="https://github.com/coolguy1842">@coolguy1842</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2474">#2474</a></li>
<li>Fix: update datapack and resourcepack versions by <a href="https://github.com/DioEgizio">@DioEgizio</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2534">#2534</a></li>
<li>Force single click to select UX by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2348">#2348</a></li>
<li>Made Custom New Instance scrollable by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2383">#2383</a></li>
<li>Update FTB App import instance path detection by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2166">#2166</a></li>
<li>Update Imgur upload by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2499">#2499</a></li>
<li>[Windows] Fix detecting Mojang JREs by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2337">#2337</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 id="removed" tabindex="-1">Removed <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.4/#removed" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<ul>
<li>Remove old version variants in instance creation by <a href="https://github.com/ColonelGerdauf">@ColonelGerdauf</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2292">#2292</a></li>
</ul>
<p>Full Changelog: <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/compare/8.3...8.4">https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/compare/8.3...8.4</a></p>
<p>You can <a href="https://prismlauncher.org/download/">grab the latest download here</a> for your respective platform.</p>
</content>
	</entry>
	
	<entry>
		<title>Microsoft authentication issues in some regions</title>
		<link href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/login-isues-10-06-24/"/>
		<updated>2024-06-09T00:00:00Z</updated>
		<id>https://prismlauncher.org/news/login-isues-10-06-24/</id>
		<content type="html"><p>Hi! We are aware of ongoing issues with the Microsoft login in Prism Launcher. We believe this is something to do with Microsoft's third party auth servers experiencing outages in some regions.<br />
The issue also sometimes affects the official Minecraft launcher and <a href="http://minecraft.net/">minecraft.net</a>.<br />
However, there has not been any official statements or way to track this from Microsoft and not all users are affected.<br />
Myself and many of the other maintainers have not been able to replicate the issue, as we seem to be in unaffected regions.</p>
<h2 id="what-can-i-do" tabindex="-1">What can I do? <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/login-isues-10-06-24/#what-can-i-do" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<p>Unfortunately in the current version, there is not much that can be done besides trying again if it does not launch. The faults seem to intermittent and only sometimes allow users to login.</p>
<p><em>Alternatively we are trialing a new authentication system in the <a href="https://nightly.link/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/workflows/trigger_builds/develop">nightly version</a> of Prism Launcher that some have reported fixes their issues.</em><br />
<em>The new nightly auth system currently has a http 426 error for some users and we are working to fix that if you have that error it is unrelated to Microsoft authentication issues.</em><br />
<strong>The Nightly version is considered pre-release software and not stable. Expect bugs.</strong></p>
<h2 id="possibly-related-issues" tabindex="-1">Possibly related issues <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/login-isues-10-06-24/#possibly-related-issues" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<p><a href="https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/WEB-7179">WEB-7179 - Mojang Bug Tracker</a></p>
<p>This report was made around same time these issues have started happening and also affected the official launcher. We are not sure if this is the same or a related issue, but it seems highly likely.</p>
</content>
	</entry>

	<entry>
		<title>Prism Launcher Release 8.1, now available</title>
		<link href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.1/"/>
		<updated>2024-03-03T00:00:00Z</updated>
		<id>https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.1/</id>
		<content type="html"><p>Hello there!</p>
<p>We have accumulated a few changes and fixes in the past few weeks and months.<br />
This release fixes problems with some newer modpacks (notably ATM) where some mods would be missing.<br />
Let's hope this makes your Prism Launcher experience even better than before!</p>
<p>Until next time!</p>
<h2 id="changelog" tabindex="-1">Changelog <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.1/#changelog" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<h2 id="added" tabindex="-1">Added <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.1/#added" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<ul>
<li>Add Modpack-page to instances that were created from files by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1732">#1732</a></li>
<li>Add button to disable resolving dependencies when installing mods by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1768">#1768</a></li>
<li>Add button to select the FTB App instances directory by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1825">#1825</a></li>
<li>Add custom environment variables to Pre-launch/Post-exit commands by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1860">#1860</a></li>
<li>Add more &quot;Open Folder&quot; actions by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1869">#1869</a></li>
<li>Add warning when updating mods while the game is running by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1852">#1852</a></li>
<li>Allow resizing columns of mod and other resource pages by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1849">#1849</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Add <code>game</code> category to instance shortcuts by <a href="https://github.com/leafeling">@leafeling</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1704">#1704</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Added warning when /tmp directory is mounted with noexec by <a href="https://github.com/bit69tream">@bit69tream</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1882">#1882</a></li>
<li>[Windows] Autodetect Java from the Microsoft Store version of the official launcher by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1798">#1798</a></li>
<li>[macOS] Add code signing and notarization by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> and <a href="https://github.com/DioEgizio">@DioEgizio</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2034">#2034</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2150">#2150</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 id="changed" tabindex="-1">Changed <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.1/#changed" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<ul>
<li>Add subtle line to instance group separator by <a href="https://github.com/TayouVR">@TayouVR</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1923">#1923</a></li>
<li>Decouple dependency check from updating mods by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1746">#1746</a></li>
<li>Improve Microsoft login flow by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1799">#1799</a></li>
<li>Improve Minecraft log performance by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2112">#2112</a></li>
<li>Improve empty instance list label by <a href="https://github.com/crpz1">@crpz1</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2141">#2141</a></li>
<li>Improvements to concurrent tasks by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1694">#1694</a></li>

<li>Remove alpha notice for Modrinth packs by <a href="https://github.com/DioEgizio">@DioEgizio</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2063">#2063</a></li>
<li>Try refreshing account on launch if needed by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1771">#1771</a></li>

<li>Fix a few use-after-free bugs by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2116">#2116</a></li>
<li>Fix importing NeoForge 1.20.1 modpacks from CurseForge by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2110">#2110</a></li>
<li>Fix online mode in legacy versions by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1999">#1999</a></li>
<li>Fix placeholder text for OpenAL override by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2012">#2012</a></li>
<li>Fix resetting settings when saving by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1857">#1857</a></li>
<li>Fix unclickable link in Modrinth API settings by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1880">#1880</a></li>
<li>Fully reload the instance list once the folder is changed by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1589">#1589</a></li>
<li>Ignore dependencies that can not be found by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1843">#1843</a></li>
<li>Improve name and tooltip of mod dependency management option by <a href="https://github.com/Desoroxxx">@Desoroxxx</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1819">#1819</a></li>
<li>Make sure MangoHud libs are present by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1815">#1815</a></li>
<li>Minor spelling fixes by <a href="https://github.com/lumiscosity">@lumiscosity</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1960">#1960</a></li>
<li>Only open/close groups using primary mouse button by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1821">#1821</a></li>
<li>Reformat Java code by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2005">#2005</a></li>
<li>Remove top-level <code>const</code> qualifiers in function declarations by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> and <a href="https://github.com/LocalSpook">@LocalSpook</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1762">#1762</a></li>
<li>Several Modrinth export fixes by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2178">#2178</a></li>
<li>Several fixes for staging instances by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2160">#2160</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Fix opening files in external apps by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1954">#1954</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2053">#2053</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Sync nightly Flatpak manifest with Flathub by <a href="https://github.com/guihkx">@guihkx</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1873">#1873</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Use absolute path to load MangoHud library by <a href="https://github.com/TheComputerGuy96">@TheComputerGuy96</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/2126">#2126</a></li>
<li>[macOS,Windows] Fix hidden minimized windows by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> and <a href="https://github.com/theMackabu">@theMackabu</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1947">#1947</a></li>
<li>[macOS] Fix instance update dialog by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1913">#1913</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 id="removed" tabindex="-1">Removed <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.1/#removed" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<ul>
<li>Remove hardcoded legacy game parameters by <a href="https://github.com/tildejustin">@tildejustin</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1983">#1983</a></li>
<li>Remove unused code by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1738">#1738</a></li>
</ul>
<p>Full Changelog: <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/compare/8.0...8.1">https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/compare/8.0...8.1</a></p>
<p>You can <a href="https://prismlauncher.org/download/">grab the latest download here</a> for your respective platform.</p>
</content>

	<entry>
		<title>Prism Launcher Release 8.0, now available</title>
		<link href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.0/"/>
		<updated>2023-11-07T00:00:00Z</updated>
		<id>https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.0/</id>
		<content type="html"><p>Hello there!</p>
<p>The last feature update was quite a while ago, so we hope we can make up for it by delivering some highly requested features!<br />
Some highlights include: an updater for Windows and Linux, CurseForge export, FTB App import, mod dependency resolution and NeoForge support.<br />
Though there is a lot more, so feel free to check the changelog below.<br />
This is probably the most feature-packed update so far, so there might be some rough edges that we hope to iron out over the next few updates.<br />
At least those future updates should now be easier than ever to install!</p>
<p>We are also happy to announce that @getchoo @TheKodeToad and @Trial97 have joined Prism Launcher as maintainers.<br />
As you are able to see in the changelog below, they all have been doing a lot of work improving Prism Launcher!<br />
Of course we are always happy to see new contributors, so if you think you might be able to help, head over to our GitHub project and see if you might be able to help out.</p>
<p>Until next time!</p>
<h2 id="changelog" tabindex="-1">Changelog <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.0/#changelog" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<h3 id="added" tabindex="-1">Added <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.0/#added" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h3>
<ul>
<li>Acknowledge version release types from mod platforms by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Ryex">@Ryex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1090">#1090</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1676">#1676</a></li>
<li>Add CurseForge modpack export by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1249">#1249</a></li>
<li>Add FTB App import by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1359">#1359</a></li>
<li>Add NeoForge support by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1498">#1498</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1541">#1541</a></li>
<li>Add a search bar to version lists by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1110">#1110</a></li>
<li>Add button to remove mod metadata by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1530">#1530</a></li>
<li>Add customizable background cats using cat packs by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1253">#1253</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1572">#1572</a></li>
<li>Add exporting mod lists to text files by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1246">#1246</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1783">#1783</a></li>
<li>Add image column to resource pages by <a href="https://github.com/Ryex">@Ryex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1058">#1058</a></li>
<li>Add link to mods' websites by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1120">#1120</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1332">#1332</a></li>
<li>Add mod count to mods page by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1119">#1119</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1272">#1272</a></li>
<li>Add optional fixes for loading skins in legacy versions by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/443">#443</a></li>
<li>Add warning when removing an account by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1782">#1782</a></li>
<li>Added Global Dependenicies toggle by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1796">#1796</a></li>
<li>Added welcome screen by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1374">#1374</a></li>
<li>Allow configuring amount of concurrent tasks by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1363">#1363</a></li>
<li>Allow showing playtime in hours by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1536">#1536</a></li>
<li>Allow updating managed packs from local file by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1405">#1405</a></li>
<li>Autodetect Java bundled with official launcher by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1685">#1685</a></li>
<li>Automatically download mod dependencies by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/986">#986</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1270">#1270</a></li>
<li>CurseForge URL handling by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a>, <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a>, <a href="https://github.com/Ryex">@Ryex</a>, <a href="https://github.com/kumquat-ir">@kumquat-ir</a> and <a href="https://github.com/timoreo22">@timoreo22</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/981">#981</a>, <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1592">#1592</a>, <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1557">#1557</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1532">#1532</a></li>
<li>Custom environment variables by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1355">#1355</a></li>
<li>Implement installing shaders from CurseForge by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1605">#1605</a></li>
<li>Implement updater for Windows and Linux by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a>, <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a>, <a href="https://github.com/flowln">@flowln</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Ryex">@Ryex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1268">#1268</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1721">#1721</a></li>
<li>More system properties by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> and <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1515">#1515</a></li>
<li>Prevent custom commands from using colored output by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1691">#1691</a></li>
<li>Renaming instance groups by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1383">#1383</a></li>
<li>Resolve dependencies when updating mods by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1263">#1263</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1678">#1678</a></li>
<li>Show progress bar when exporting instances by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1378">#1378</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Add more Java installation directories by <a href="https://github.com/nea89o">@nea89o</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1682">#1682</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Add support for Snap packaging by <a href="https://github.com/ashuntu">@ashuntu</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1294">#1294</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Filter source in Nix Flake &amp; add controller support by <a href="https://github.com/getchoo">@getchoo</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1618">#1618</a></li>
<li>[macOS] Add macOS support to Nix by <a href="https://github.com/getchoo">@getchoo</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1485">#1485</a></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="changed" tabindex="-1">Changed <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.0/#changed" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h3>
<ul>
<li>Add suport for ATLauncher browser download by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1549">#1549</a></li>
<li>Add support for multiple custom icon themes and improve UX around themes by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a>, <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> and <a href="https://github.com/TayouVR">@TayouVR</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1407">#1407</a></li>
<li>Add support for multiple mod loader filters for CurseForge by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1560">#1560</a></li>
<li>Added version check for neoforge filter by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1658">#1658</a></li>
<li>Allow disabling bundling and Sparkle updater when building by <a href="https://github.com/getchoo">@getchoo</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1452">#1452</a></li>
<li>Allow editing of running instances by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1241">#1241</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1338">#1338</a></li>
<li>Better instance shortcuts on macOS by <a href="https://github.com/iivusly">@iivusly</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1081">#1081</a></li>
<li>Bump Qt to Qt 6.6.0 by <a href="https://github.com/DioEgizio">@DioEgizio</a> and <a href="https://github.com/TayouVR">@TayouVR</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1717">#1717</a></li>
<li>Combine launch buttons in instance window, persist profiler by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> and <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1320">#1320</a></li>
<li>Don't enable address sanitizer in debug builds by default by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1517">#1517</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1518">#1518</a></li>
<li>Don't instantiate nixpkgs in Flake by <a href="https://github.com/getchoo">@getchoo</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1574">#1574</a></li>
<li>Don't update Java minimum memory based on maximum memory allocation by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1552">#1552</a></li>
<li>Fix links and add images to modpack changelogs by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1370">#1370</a></li>
<li>Generate predictable UUIDs for offline accounts by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1399">#1399</a></li>
<li>Implement GLFW/OpenAL override by defining and auto-detecting paths to library files by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1392">#1392</a></li>
<li>Improve design of instance group header by <a href="https://github.com/TayouVR">@TayouVR</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1286">#1286</a></li>
<li>Improvements and refinements to pack export by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1519">#1519</a></li>
<li>Improvements to modpack UX by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1539">#1539</a></li>
<li>Introduce more strict compiler warnings and fix them by <a href="https://github.com/getchoo">@getchoo</a>, <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a>, <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Ryex">@Ryex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1107">#1107</a>, <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1581">#1581</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1537">#1537</a></li>
<li>Refactor mod metadata write by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1543">#1543</a></li>
<li>Reformat codebase by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1459">#1459</a></li>
<li>Replace <code>typedef</code> with <code>using</code> by <a href="https://github.com/LocalSpook">@LocalSpook</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1748">#1748</a></li>
<li>Resolve Forge versions for CurseForge modpacks using meta by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1402">#1402</a></li>
<li>Revamp loader installation UI by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> and <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1230">#1230</a></li>
<li>Simplify flame and modrinth exports by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1391">#1391</a></li>
<li>Skip folders when updating mods by <a href="https://github.com/bolli24">@bolli24</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1643">#1643</a></li>
<li>Various UI tweaks by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> and <a href="https://github.com/leia-uwu">@leia-uwu</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1324">#1324</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1535">#1535</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Switch to garnix for Nix builds by <a href="https://github.com/getchoo">@getchoo</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1434">#1434</a>, <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1467">#1467</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1446">#1446</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Use addOpenGLRunpath.driverLink in Nix wrapper by <a href="https://github.com/getchoo">@getchoo</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1666">#1666</a></li>
<li>[macOS,Windows] Update to Qt 6.5.2 by <a href="https://github.com/DioEgizio">@DioEgizio</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1483">#1483</a></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="fixed" tabindex="-1">Fixed <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.0/#fixed" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h3>
<ul>
<li>Add some missing strings to translations by <a href="https://github.com/tjw123hh">@tjw123hh</a> and <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1427">#1427</a></li>
<li>Allow loading themes with missing resources folder by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1722">#1722</a></li>
<li>Don't display invalid shaders by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1657">#1657</a></li>
<li>Don't omit empty lines in log output by <a href="https://github.com/comp500">@comp500</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1508">#1508</a></li>
<li>Don't reset meta URL on launch by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1476">#1476</a></li>
<li>Don't update mods if no mod loader is installed by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1670">#1670</a></li>
<li>Enable antialiasing for mod and pack icons by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1578">#1578</a></li>
<li>Fix crash when hiding columns on resource packs page by <a href="https://github.com/leia-uwu">@leia-uwu</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1258">#1258</a></li>
<li>Fix crash when installing some ATLauncher packs by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1523">#1523</a></li>
<li>Fix crash with mod icon caching by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1772">#1772</a></li>
<li>Fix filtering in instance export by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1575">#1575</a></li>
<li>Fix importing Quilt/Fabric packs from CurseForge by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1512">#1512</a></li>
<li>Fix Java memory bein unset on initial setup by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1747">#1747</a></li>
<li>Fix parsing of resource packs by <a href="https://github.com/TayouVR">@TayouVR</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1742">#1742</a></li>
<li>Fix save location of FTB packs by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1591">#1591</a></li>
<li>Fix several issues around instance groups by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1766">#1766</a></li>
<li>Fix squished mod icons by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1739">#1739</a></li>
<li>Fix task progress being stuck if a task is aborted by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1516">#1516</a></li>
<li>Fix transparency in skin icon by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> and <a href="https://github.com/lumiscosity">@lumiscosity</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1513">#1513</a></li>
<li>Fix typo in Task code by <a href="https://github.com/getchoo">@getchoo</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1447">#1447</a></li>
<li>Fix various list interactions by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1553">#1553</a></li>
<li>Fix wrong account selection by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1692">#1692</a></li>
<li>Gracefully handle invalid cache metadata by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1556">#1556</a></li>
<li>Ignore cache files by default when exporting instances by <a href="https://github.com/LostLuma">@LostLuma</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1437">#1437</a></li>
<li>Localize sorting options for resource and shader packs by <a href="https://github.com/LocalSpook">@LocalSpook</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1760">#1760</a></li>
<li>Only build updater when correct conditions are met by <a href="https://github.com/getchoo">@getchoo</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1724">#1724</a></li>
<li>Pack import fixes and improvements by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1563">#1563</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1737">#1737</a></li>
<li>Preserve file extension of instance icon when importing by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1456">#1456</a></li>
<li>Refactor ImgurUpload by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1290">#1290</a></li>
<li>Reintroduce parsing of INI files by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1449">#1449</a></li>
<li>Replace references to &quot;Minecraft account&quot; by <a href="https://github.com/dannydorazio">@dannydorazio</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1551">#1551</a></li>
<li>Reset status label when deleting instance by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1548">#1548</a></li>
<li>Update copyright year by <a href="https://github.com/apix0n">@apix0n</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1474">#1474</a></li>
<li>Update default account when accounts change by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1672">#1672</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Fix build on Arch Linux with Qt 6.6 by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1709">#1709</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Fix loading MangoHud by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1797">#1797</a></li>
<li>[Windows] Fix attaching logs to console by <a href="https://github.com/Ryex">@Ryex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1464">#1464</a></li>
<li>[Windows] Fix copying folder attributes by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1673">#1673</a></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="removed" tabindex="-1">Removed <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-8.0/#removed" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h3>
<ul>
<li>Drop &quot;DirectJava&quot; launch method by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1339">#1339</a></li>
<li>Drop support for Mojang accounts by <a href="https://github.com/getchoo">@getchoo</a>, <a href="https://github.com/Edgars-Cirulis">@Edgars-Cirulis</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1656">#1656</a> and <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1793">#1793</a></li>
<li>Remove Quilt Beacon toggle by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1547">#1547</a></li>
<li>Remove warning about Quilt being unsupported with CurseForge modpacks by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1445">#1445</a></li>
<li>[Windows] Remove Windows 7/8 support from app manifest by <a href="https://github.com/IThundxr">@IThundxr</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1758">#1758</a></li>
</ul>
<p>Full Changelog: <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/compare/7.2...8.0">https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/compare/7.2...8.0</a></p>
<p>You can <a href="https://prismlauncher.org/download/">grab the latest download here</a> for your respective platform.</p>
</content>
	</entry>
	
	<entry>
		<title>[MALWARE WARNING] RCE Vulnerability on some modded servers - Bleeding Pipe</title>
		<link href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/"/>
		<updated>2023-07-30T00:00:00Z</updated>
		<id>https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/</id>
		<content type="html"><p>For a full summary, please see this blogpost from the <a href="https://github.com/Minecraft-Malware-Prevention-Alliance">Minecraft Malware Prevention Alliance</a>: <a href="https://blog.mmpa.info/posts/bleeding-pipe/">https://blog.mmpa.info/posts/bleeding-pipe/</a></p>
<p>On July 29th, 2023, the Minecraft Malware Prevention Alliance (MMPA) released a blogpost detailing the exploitation of some mods on 1.7.10, 1.12.2, and possibly other versions of Forge servers. Malicious actors took advantage of vulnerabilities in how they deserialized data, allowing them to have Remote Code Execution (<a href="https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/security/what-is-remote-code-execution/">RCE</a>) on both clients and servers. It is currently unknown what exactly was done, but it can be assumed a malicious payload was being sent to affected devices; there are no known methods to detect if this happened to you.</p>
<p>Table of Contents:</p>
<div class="table-of-contents"><ul><li><a href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/#what-can-i-do">What can I do? </a><ul><li><a href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/#everyone">Everyone </a></li><li><a href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/#players">Players </a></li><li><a href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/#server-administrators">Server Administrators </a></li></ul></li><li><a href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/#affected-mods">Affected mods </a></li><li><a href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/#references">References </a></li><li><a href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/#thanks">Thanks </a></li></ul></div>
<h2 id="what-can-i-do" tabindex="-1">What can I do? <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/#what-can-i-do" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<p>Following the MMPA's guidance:</p>
<h3 id="everyone" tabindex="-1">Everyone <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/#everyone" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h3>
<p><a href="https://modrinth.com/mod/pipeblocker">Pipeblocker</a> is a mod created by the MMPA that can protect against all mods affected by this vulnerability. It can be used on any server or client on Forge 1.7.2-1.12.2.</p>
<h3 id="players" tabindex="-1">Players <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/#players" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h3>
<p>Player can manually check folders such as <code>.minecraft</code> for suspicious files. Tools such as <a href="https://github.com/NeRdTheNed/jSus">jSus</a> and <a href="https://github.com/KosmX/jneedle">jNeedle</a> can also be used to scan folders automatically.</p>
<h3 id="server-administrators" tabindex="-1">Server Administrators <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/#server-administrators" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h3>
<p>If you use the mods listed below, it is recommended to update them to the latest version available. For BDLib specifically, the GT New Horizions fork is recommended.</p>
<h2 id="affected-mods" tabindex="-1">Affected mods <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/#affected-mods" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<ul>
<li>AetherCraft</li>
<li>Advent of Ascension (Nevermine) (only affects 1.12.2)</li>
<li>Arrows Plus</li>
<li>Astral Sorcery (versions &lt;=1.9.1)</li>
<li>BDLib (versions 1.7-1.12)</li>
<li>Brazier</li>
<li>Carbonization</li>
<li>Custom Friends Capes</li>
<li>CustomOreGen</li>
<li>DankNull</li>
<li>Energy Manipulation</li>
<li>EnderCore (dependency of EnderIO, only affects 1.9-1.13)</li>
<li>EndermanEvolution</li>
<li>Extrafirma</li>
<li>Gadomancy</li>
<li>Giacomo's Bookshelf</li>
<li>Immersive Armors (only affects 1.17.1, 1.18.1, 1.19.0, and 1.19.1)</li>
<li>Immersive Aircraft</li>
<li>Immersive Paintings</li>
<li>JourneyMap (introduced in 1.16.5-5.7.1 and Fixed in 1.16.5-5.7.2 No other versions were effected)</li>
<li>LanteaCraft / SGCraft</li>
<li>LogisticsPipes (only affects 1.4.7-1.7.10)</li>
<li>Minecraft Comes Alive (MCA) (only affects 1.5.2-1.6.4)</li>
<li>MattDahEpic Core (MDECore) (only affects 1.8.8-1.12.2)</li>
<li>mxTune (only affects 1.12-1.16.5)</li>
<li>p455w0rd's Things</li>
<li>Project Blue</li>
<li>RadixCore</li>
<li>RebornCore (affects versions &gt;= 3.13.8, &lt;4.7.3)</li>
<li>SimpleAchievements</li>
<li>SmartMoving</li>
<li>Strange</li>
<li>SuperMartijn642's Config Lib (only affects versions &lt;1.0.9)</li>
<li>Thaumic Tinkerer (fixed in version 2.3-138 for Minecraft 1.7.2, versions for 1.6-1.6.4 remain affected)</li>
<li>Tough Expansion</li>
<li>ttCore (only affects 1.7.10)</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="references" tabindex="-1">References <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/#references" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<p><a href="https://blog.mmpa.info/posts/bleeding-pipe/">https://blog.mmpa.info/posts/bleeding-pipe/</a></p>
<p><a href="https://unascribed.com/mc-mad-gadget.html">https://unascribed.com/mc-mad-gadget.html</a></p>
<p><a href="https://discord.com/channels/1115852272245686334/1116187144973713518/1134919145268449361">https://discord.com/channels/1115852272245686334/1116187144973713518/1134919145268449361</a></p>
<h2 id="thanks" tabindex="-1">Thanks <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/bleedingpipe-alert/#thanks" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<p>We would like to thank the MMPA for the detailed blogpost explaining the situation and the release of Pipeblocker. If you are interested, you can join their Discord server here: <a href="https://discord.gg/5NvpmUttDP">https://discord.gg/5NvpmUttDP</a>.</p>
<p><a href="https://unascribed.com/">unascribed</a> also did great work in collecting a larger lists of affected mods, which you can find <a href="https://unascribed.com/mc-mad-gadget.html">here</a>.</p>
</content>
	</entry>
	
	<entry>
		<title>Prism Launcher Release 7.2, now available</title>
		<link href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-7.2/"/>
		<updated>2023-07-26T00:00:00Z</updated>
		<id>https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-7.2/</id>
		<content type="html"><p>Hello!</p>
<p>This is a smaller release, with mostly bug fixes. We fixed lots of bugs (old and new) in this one as well as adding some new smaller features.</p>
<p>Until next time!</p>
<h2 id="changelog" tabindex="-1">Changelog <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-7.2/#changelog" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<h3 id="added" tabindex="-1">Added <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-7.2/#added" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h3>
<ul>
<li>Add Git Blame ignore file by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1275">#1275</a></li>
<li>Add LiteMod support to mod browser by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1334">#1334</a></li>
<li>Add option to always use system locale by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1345">#1345</a></li>
<li>Add 'Suggest a Feature' to help menu by <a href="https://github.com/getchoo">@getchoo</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1251">#1251</a></li>
<li>Add toggle for quilt beacon by <a href="https://github.com/getchoo">@getchoo</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1357">#1357</a> <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1387">#1387</a></li>
<li>Add validation for metadata URL by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1325">#1325</a></li>
<li>Automatically focus search bar when opening resource browser by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1369">#1369</a></li>
<li>Enable address sanitizer in debug builds by <a href="https://github.com/Ryex">@Ryex</a> and <a href="https://github.com/flowln">@flowln</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1306">#1306</a></li>
<li>Optional mods in .mrpack export by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1321">#1321</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Add close button to the main toolbar when running on Gamescope by <a href="https://github.com/leia-uwu">@leia-uwu</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1065">#1065</a></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="changed" tabindex="-1">Changed <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-7.2/#changed" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h3>
<ul>

	<entry>
		<title>Prism Launcher Release 7.1, now available</title>
		<link href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-7.1/"/>
		<updated>2023-06-16T00:00:00Z</updated>
		<id>https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-7.1/</id>
		<content type="html"><p>Hello!</p>
<p>This is a smaller release, with mostly bug fixes. There are also some minor improvements, like an easier way to open the launcher's data directory, and allowing users to edit instance settings even while an instance is running.</p>
<p>There is also an important fix for the .mrpack export on Windows. Previously, the launcher would bundle all mods into the final modpack ZIP. Now the launcher will correctly bundle the metadata instead. This bug caused trouble at Modrinth as people started uploading these modpacks there. We are very sorry for this bug and hope to catch these kinds of issues through our testing initiative on our Discord server.</p>
<p>Until next time!</p>
<h2 id="changelog" tabindex="-1">Changelog <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-7.1/#changelog" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h2>
<h3 id="added" tabindex="-1">Added <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-7.1/#added" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h3>
<ul>
<li>Add icons to export menu items by <a href="https://github.com/leo78913">@leo78913</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1162">#1162</a></li>
<li>Add the launcher root folder to the Folders menu by <a href="https://github.com/RedsonBr140">@RedsonBr140</a> and <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1063">#1063</a></li>
<li>Higlight installed mods in download dialog by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1135">#1135</a></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="changed" tabindex="-1">Changed <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-7.1/#changed" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h3>
<ul>
<li>Don't hide the settings tab when an instance is running by <a href="https://github.com/RedsonBr140">@RedsonBr140</a> and <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1067">#1067</a></li>
<li>Exclude <code>.git</code> directory from the source code tarball by <a href="https://github.com/guihkx">@guihkx</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1140">#1140</a></li>
<li>Make Konami Code a <em>bit</em> more obvious by <a href="https://github.com/TayouVR">@TayouVR</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1151">#1151</a></li>
<li>Store logs in seperate directory by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> and <a href="https://github.com/chmodsayshello">@chmodsayshello</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1099">#1099</a></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="fixed" tabindex="-1">Fixed <a class="direct-link" href="https://prismlauncher.org/news/release-7.1/#fixed" aria-hidden="true">#</a></h3>
<ul>
<li>Fix error message about JavaVendor by <a href="https://github.com/Scrumplex">@Scrumplex</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1195">#1195</a></li>
<li>Fix parsing of settings file by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1174">#1174</a> <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1192">#1192</a></li>
<li>Fix some crashes regarding high network usage by <a href="https://github.com/Trial97">@Trial97</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1145">#1145</a></li>
<li>Fix trailing space in instance name by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1198">#1198</a></li>
<li>[Linux] Fix devShell for Nix users by <a href="https://github.com/getchoo">@getchoo</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1159">#1159</a></li>
<li>[Windows] Fix mrpack export bundling all mods by <a href="https://github.com/TheKodeToad">@TheKodeToad</a> in <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/pull/1166">#1166</a></li>
</ul>
<p>Full Changelog: <a href="https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/compare/7.0...7.1">https://github.com/PrismLauncher/PrismLauncher/compare/7.0...7.1</a></p>
<p>You can <a href="https://prismlauncher.org/download/">grab the latest download here</a> for your respective platform.</p>
</content>
